titleStmt.title: A vindication of A discourse concerning the unreasonableness of a new separation on account of the oaths from the exceptions made against it in a tract called, A brief answer to a late discourse, &c.
titleStmt.author: Williams, John, 1636?-1709.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to John Williams. cf. NUC pre-1956.
